description:
cmd/go: fixed panic on `go clean -n` and `go clean -x`.
        also made generated scripts act more like running go clean itself

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=97736bb869c4 ***

cmd/go: fixed panic on `go clean -n` and `go clean -x`.
        also made generated scripts act more like running go clean itself

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev, rsc
http://codereview.appspot.com/5624049

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5624049: cmd/go: fixed panic on `go clean -n` and `go clean -x`.
